metadata.name: Lyrical night 2080
metadata.description:
"Beauty I'd always missed
With these eyes before
Just what the truth is
I can't say anymore"
   ~Justin Haywood (Nights in white satin - Moody 
      Blues)

I hear the words and she emerges from abstraction. As I paint she becomes a beautiful representation of a distant memory.

The analog work is oil and cold wax on board (80%) and the digital finishing (20%) gives her 1/1 credentials.
